video.title: Ten Ox Herding Pictures (Picture Ten - Entering the Marketplace with Extended Hands) - Zen Buddhism
video.description:
The Ten Ox Herding Pictures  is a series of short poems and accompanying drawings used in the Zen tradition to describe the stages of a practitioner's progress toward enlightenment, and his or her return to society to enact wisdom and compassion.  
Commentary by Yamada Mumom. Translated by Victor Sogen Hori

Music: Hiroshi Yoshimuri - Wet Land
Dream of the Blue Whale - Anders Holte
